episodes.title: Scientology terms in “non-religious” texts. “Mass” “material universe” “Thetan”
episodes.description:
#scientology #selfhelp #education

THE BASIC STUDY MANUAL

The video discusses the Basic Study Manual, a book considered secular in Scientology. The speaker, a former Scientologist, points out that the book contains Scientology terminology and concepts, such as “mass” and “material universe,” which are disguised as study tools. The speaker emphasizes that the book should not be considered secular due to its Scientology content.

episodes.title: Scientology programming techniques: Ethics Programs
episodes.description:
#scientology #leahremini #mirriamfrancis

Miriam Francis and Louis Repetto expose Scientology's gas lighting techniques used on Danny Masterson's victims to shut them up. Scientology Ethics Programs designed to make a victim realize they are the one at fault. 

Miriam Francis was born into Scientology, grew up as a child within Scientology secret Sea Org cult, slaved in it, escaped. She was on the Emmy Award winning show LEAH REMINI: SCIENTOLOGY AND THE AFTERMATH season 2 episode 1. Miriam Francis is a courageous critic of Scientology and its built in abuse practices. She is an expert in Scientology child manipulation techniques. She is well versed in the court proceedings that convicted serial rapist and Scientologist in good standing, Danny Masterson. 

Louis Repetto was born into Scientology, grew up as a child within Scientology's front group schools, slaved in the billion year contract Sea Org cult. Louis was a clone of L. Ron Hubbard. Trained to lead staff and public further into the prison of belief.
